item.title: Time to buy the dip in Costco? Here's what the charts say
item.description: Frank Cappelleri breaks down the charts on the warehouse club.

item.title: Buy these 'diamonds in the rough' that will lead a market bounce, Evercore ISI says
item.description: To find some potential breakout names, the firm searched for stocks that have high short interest and low valuations after the recent sell-off.

item.title: Evercore ISI upgrades this bank stock ahead of a major deal closing later in 2025
item.description: While shares of Capital One Financial have underperformed in recent weeks, it may be poised for gains in the path ahead, according to Evercore ISI.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says this little-known energy stock is a buy and can climb nearly 40%
item.description: This company is an AI data center play that could be set up for major gains over the next several months, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: The S&P 500 could see 3% to 5% bounce from oversold levels, Piper Sandler says
item.description: A solid rebound could be in store for U.S. stocks after a wildly volatile few weeks, according to the firm.
